### Mattermost

You can join our public mattermost channel [here](https://lmmisld-lmu-stats-slds.srv.mwn.de/mlr_invite/).

### StackOverflow

Questions regarding the software can be asked on [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com), where
you can use the `mlr3` tag.

### GitHub

For bug reports, suggestions, or feature requests please raise an issue in the corresponding
[GitHub repository](https://github.com/mlr-org). Your issue will be addressed sooner if you
provide a reproducible example - e.g. using the [reprex R package](https://github.com/tidyverse/reprex) -
and if you raise it in the correct repository.
